channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hand soap recalled over bacterial contamination that could cause sepsis. Here’s a list of the affected products.
Tropical Storm Erin to become hurricane. Where it's going, Sarasota, Bradenton impact
The next 'Big One' on the San Andreas fault might not be the earthquake we expect, researchers say
Bones in Norway Cave Reveal Chilling Fate of Ice Age Animals
Russian MiG-29 Fitted With An “Interceptor Drone” Is A Laughable Mess
Flooding cancels last day of Wisconsin State Fair, water rescues in Milwaukee
item.description: Heavy rainfall in half a dozen states leads to water rescues, power outages.

item.title: Trump's big bill is powering his mass deportations. Congress is starting to ask questions
item.description: Included in the Republican Party’s big bill of tax breaks and spending cuts is funding to power President Donald Trump's deportation agenda

item.title: Former K-9 busy as a bee sniffing out threats to Michigan State University colonies

item.title: Tourist who flew to Puerto Rico for Bad Bunny concert was fatally shot, police say
item.description: A tourist from the U.S. mainland who was visiting Puerto Rico for Bad Bunny’s residency has been fatally shot at La Perla, a popular seaside shantytow...

item.title: Nearly 200K in New Jersey still under boil water advisory days after water main break
item.description: A water main break that occurred late last week in a major northern New Jersey city continues to cause headaches for residents
